diff_act: 4.set the supervised Shunting speed to a fixed value
5.trigger an immediate automatic stop of the train

regen.absent_element: action when the supervised shunting speed is exceeded
regen.new_specification: The system shall trigger an alarm or warning to the driver if the train exceeds the supervised shunting speed during Shunting operation.

regen.absent_element: action for when the supervised shunting speed is exceeded
regen.new_specification: The system shall trigger an alarm or warning to the driver if the train exceeds the supervised shunting speed during Shunting operation.

regen.absent_element: confirmation from the driver for manual selection of Shunting
regen.new_specification: The system shall require confirmation from the driver when manually selecting Shunting from Stand By operation, Full Supervision operation or Partial Supervision operation.

label: Before authomatic transition to Shunting, ETCS shall request confirmation from the driver.
absence: confirmation from the driver if authomatic transition to Shunting
